description.addFace: Walk through adding a new collection to the Face Library.
description.placeholder: Enter a name for this collection
description.invalidName: Invalid name. Names can only include letters, numbers, spaces, apostrophes, underscores, and hyphens.

details.scoreInfo: The sub label score is the weighted score for all of the recognized face confidences, so this may differ from the score shown on the snapshot.
details.faceDesc: Details of the tracked object that generated this face

uploadFaceImage.title: Upload Face Image
uploadFaceImage.desc: Upload an image to scan for faces and include for {{pageToggle}}

createFaceLibrary.title: Create Collection
createFaceLibrary.nextSteps:
To build a strong foundation:
  • Use the Train tab to select and train on images for each detected person.
  • Focus on straight-on images for best results; avoid training images that capture faces at an angle.

description.uploadFace: Upload an image of {{name}} that shows their face from a front-facing angle. The image does not need to be cropped to just their face.

train.title: Train
train.empty: There are no recent face recognition attempts

deleteFaceLibrary.title: Delete Name
deleteFaceLibrary.desc: Are you sure you want to delete the collection {{name}}? This will permanently delete all associated faces.

deleteFaceAttempts.title: Delete Faces
deleteFaceAttempts.desc_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} face? This action cannot be undone.
deleteFaceAttempts.desc_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} faces? This action cannot be undone.

imageEntry.dropInstructions: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select

success.addFaceLibrary: {{name}} has successfully been added to the Face Library!
